name: pcrypto
description: text encryption and decryption in the browser

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && browserify dist/pcrypto.global.js -o dist/pcrypto.global.bundle.js && echo Done build.
scripts.test-debug: echo Launching web server for: http://localhost:8844/ && browserify dist/pcrypto.test.js | tape-run --port 8844
